author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: A sing-along Broadway Halloween
text:
A sing-along Broadway Halloween Oct 20, 2015 
Belfast — Belfast Breeze Inn & Music by the Bay, 192 Northport Ave. at Route 1, invites Halloween revelers to come dressed as their favorite Broadway musical performers or characters and enjoy a sing-along Halloween party with John Nowak and Lincoln Blake Saturday, Oct. 31, from 7 to 10 p.m. 
Prizes for Best Broadway Show Costumes and Best Broadway Show Sing-alongs include a two-night stay in the inn; dinner show voucher for $50; a one-night stay in the Lodge; Belfast Breeze Inn Camp Shirts; and surprises. There will be a cash bar and $5 psychic readings. 
Cost is $13, which includes a buffet of hors d’oeuvres, candy and live music. There also are two costume-party-night lodging packages available. For more information, call 505-5231 or visit belfastbreezeinn.com . 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
